synopsis
Michael Myers, a child of six years, wearing a clown mask and suit, kills his 17 year old sister to death. 15 years later, on the night of October 30, 1978, Dr. Sam Loomis, a psychiatrist at Michael Myers, accompanied by Nurse Marion Chambers, goes to the asylum Smith's Grove-Warren County Sanitarium, and came to realize that there was a mass escape of prisoners, including Michael Myers (now 21). The next day, the small town of Haddonfield prepares to host the Halloween night.
Laurie Strode, a teenager of seventeen who is a "bookworm", refuses to accompany her friends Annie and Lynda to a party, it has to babysit Tommy Doyle.
While walking down the street, Annie, Laurie and Linda meet Michael, who is now driving. Annie, as I wanted to see who was driving, said: "Hey Niki Lauda, Not so fast". Michael, angry, stalking the three girls during the trip back home. But
that is not enough for Michael.Meanwhile, Dr. Loomis has arrived, tracking down his patient. He and Sheriff Leigh Brackett (father of Annie) find that Michael Myers took refuge in his old house, now abandoned: half-eaten dog is found there. The doctor explains the agent that Myers is not mad either, not even a human being, but that is purely and simply evil.
